item.title: Sprint ip Phone Spammer
item.dc:creator: @PHISH-PHREAK PHISH-PHREAK
item.description:
@PHISH-PHREAK wrote:

This is my first scar script ive ever made. What it is is a phone spammer so you can call someones phone constantly for hours on end. The way i do it is i open firefox at full screen with no other tabs and go to sprintip.com If someone better at scar scripting could make a more advanced version of this that would be great.

[scar]program Call;
procedure call;
begin
activateclient;
movemouse(316,338);
clickmouse(316,338,true);
wait(3000);
sendkeys(‘enter phone number here’);
movemouse(422,529);
clickmouse(422,529,true);
wait(90000);
movemouse(859,484);
movemouse(859,484);
clickmouse(859,484,true);
clickmouse(859,484,true);
clickmouse(859,484,true);
clickmouse(859,484,true);
clickmouse(859,484,true);
end;
begin
repeat
call;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
